From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

Plintissa eyes flew open wide with that statement by Iron Raptor. "The
enemy?" Plintissa whispered. "Damn it! I stole your damn chip to fix up my
base, I gave the thing back, to make up for taking it I donated ALOT of
weapons to you Maximals, my base and group is a supporter to you Maximals,
and I'm the enemy? I didn't think anything could come between us Iron
Raptor, my old friend on Cybertron died, my one true love is dead, my group
is dying, I have hunters after me, Ramhorn won't leave me alone, and this is
the way you treat me? Sure I slashed at Liono's backside but who wouldn't? I
just wanted to challenge him, and when he wouldn't accept, I drove my weapon
into his back. Doesn't everyone deserve a second chance?" Plintissa looked
into Iron Rator's eyes and a tear falls from her face. Plintissa looks on as
Artist comes into the room.

"I wish to join you." Artist says.

"My true love really is dead." Plintissa whispered...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Iron Raptor" <ironraptor13@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 22, 2000 9:50 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars




* Iron Raptor looked back at Plintissa as she waited for Prowl to get a move
on, the words from her old friend's mouth surprising her a little. This
fembot before her wondering what her position in HER army was? HER army?
Since when was the Maximal force completely hers? She knew that she was one
of those whom looked after the well being of the Maximals troops but she
never even thought that they would ever be hers.she even doubted that they
even liked her.
The thought was new and she was even a bit flattered by the image of her as
a leader in other's optics but she doubted that they liked her and the
thought was banished.
Iron Raptor shrugged as she then worked her hand in a bit tighter with
Prowl's. *

" I have no idea, I'm not commander so I don't know what you position is.
Besides, I thought that you were the enemy now?"

*But then her attention turned towards Prowl as she then felt his arm go
slack as he had fallen, her optics full of concern as she watched him raise
to his feet. She then braced herself as he used her for support, then
bringing a hand around him to steady him further but with enough care that
it would not hurt him too much. The feel of his ribs against her arm made
her want to something that would take the pain away, something that could
comfort him into forgetting about the pain. The look on her face was that of
love but enough concern that it pained her just as much as his ribs did him,
she so wanted to just take the pain away.but she couldn't.
But with the explosion behind them she then moved off towards the base but
at a pace that Prowl could easily keep up with, a small smile on her face to
lighten the mood as a small comment formed in her mind. *

" I have something that'll take the thought of pain right out of you mind,
but I don't think that you can't handle it right now."

* With that she looked over at him with a sly look on her face, she DID have
something that could take the pain right out of his mind but this wasn't the
time or the place for something like that. A small chuckle escaped her
throat as they neared the doors of the Ark, though not sure if he was in the
mood for a small pun.
With the end of the chuckle she then came up to the doors and watched them
open, then moving into the base with Prowl in toe. The CR chambers came into
sight and she sighed; now they could relax and repair. *
